class.name: B4R::B4RVL53L1X
class.comment: This is a library that helps interface with ST's VL53L1X time-of-flight distance sensor. It wraps this library : https://github.com/sparkfun/SparkFun_VL53L1X_Arduino_Library The library makes it simple to configure the sensor and read range data from it via I²C. https://www.st.com/resource/en/datasheet/vl53l1x.pdf You must use Arduino to install the VL53L1X library by SparkFun You must have a Wiremaster initialized. Example: Sub Process_Globals Private Master As WireMaster Private VL53 As VL53L1X End Sub Private Sub AppStart Master.Initialize VL53.Initialize End Sub

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialization of sensor

method.name: SetI2CAddress
method.comment: Set the I2C address

method.name: GetI2CAddress
method.comment: Get the I2C address

method.name: ClearInterrupt
method.comment: Clear the interrupt flag

method.name: SetInterruptPolarityHigh
method.comment: Set the polarity of an active interrupt to High

method.name: SetInterruptPolarityLow
method.comment: Set the polarity of an active interrupt to Low

method.name: GetInterruptPolarity
method.comment: get the current interrupt polarity

method.name: StartRanging
method.comment: Begins taking measurements

method.name: StopRanging
method.comment: Stops taking measurements

method.name: CheckForDataReady
method.comment: Checks the to see if data is ready

method.name: SetTimingBudgetInMs
method.comment: Set the timing budget for a measurement

method.name: GetTimingBudgetInMs
method.comment: Get the timing budget for a measurement

method.name: SetDistanceModeLong
method.comment: Set to 4M range

method.name: SetDistanceModeShort
method.comment: Set to 1.3M range

method.name: GetDistanceMode
method.comment: Get the distance mode, returns 1 for short and 2 for long

method.name: SetIntermeasurementPeriod
method.comment: Set time between measurements in ms Intermeasurement period must be >= timing budget.

method.name: GetIntermeasurementPeriod
method.comment: Get time between measurements in ms

method.name: GetDistance
method.comment: Returns distance

method.name: GetSignalRate
method.comment: Returns the signal rate in kcps. All SPADs combined.

method.name: GetAmbientRate
method.comment: Returns the total ambinet rate in kcps. All SPADs combined.

method.name: GetRangeStatus
method.comment: Returns the range status, which can be any of the following. 0 = no error 1 = signal fail 2 = sigma fail 7 = wrapped target fail

method.name: SetOffset
method.comment: Manually set an offset in mm

method.name: GetOffset
method.comment: Get the current offset in mm

method.name: SetXTalk
method.comment: Manually set the value of crosstalk in counts per second (cps), which is interference from any sort of window in front of your sensor.

method.name: GetXTalk
method.comment: Returns the current crosstalk value in cps.

method.name: SetDistanceThreshold
method.comment: Set bounds for the interrupt. lowThresh and hiThresh are the bounds of your interrupt while window decides when the interrupt should fire. The options for window are : 0: Interrupt triggered on measured distance below lowThresh. 1: Interrupt triggered on measured distance above hiThresh. 2: Interrupt triggered on measured distance outside of bounds. 3: Interrupt triggered on measured distance inside of bounds.

method.name: GetDistanceThresholdWindow
method.comment: Returns distance threshold window option

method.name: GetDistanceThresholdLow
method.comment: Returns lower bound in mm.

method.name: GetDistanceThresholdHigh
method.comment: Returns upper bound in mm

method.name: SetSignalThreshold
method.comment: Programs the necessary threshold to trigger a measurement. Default is 1024 kcps.

method.name: GetSignalThreshold
method.comment: Returns the signal threshold in kcps

method.name: SetSigmaThreshold
method.comment: Programs a new sigma threshold in mm. default=15 mm

method.name: GetSigmaThreshold
method.comment: Returns the current sigma threshold.

method.name: StartTemperatureUpdate
method.comment: Recalibrates the sensor for temperature changes. Run this any time the temperature has changed by more than 8°C

method.name: CalibrateOffset
method.comment: Autocalibrate the offset by placing a target a known distance away from the sensor and passing this known distance into the setOffset() function.

method.name: CalibrateXTalk
method.comment: Autocalibrate the crosstalk by placing a target a known distance away from the sensor and passing this known distance into the SetXTalk() function.
